titleStmt.title: A summons to the grave, or, The necessity of a timely preparation for death demonstrated in a sermon preached at the funeral of that most eminent and faithful servant of Jesus Christ Mr. John Norcot who departed this life March 24, 1675/6 / by Benjamin Keach.
titleStmt.author: Keach, Benjamin, 1640-1704.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
